Inspection Software & Mobile App for Home Inspectors

Advanced cloud based home inspection software. Customizable template & Reports. Save 75% inspection time.

Start FREE Trial

SnapInspect's inspection software enables home inspectors to effectively conduct inspections. Write home inspection reports using our industry proven templates or use your preferred template. SnapInspect has the most powerful report customization tools to help you create outstanding home inspection reports that clients will love.

Apps for iOS or Android

  • Conduct home inspections onsite and completely offline using ratings, comments, photos, videos and signatures
  • Use our pre-built templates for home inspections or bring your ideal template over
  • Carry outinspections using own ratings, records comments, photos, videos and signatures within the app
  • Standard Home Inspection, 4 Point, TREC, Wind Mitigation, Muld, Environmental, Thermal & Heating, Home Energy Score
  • Auto Text, Voice Dictation and Smart Comments to accelerate report writing
  • Photo Annotations to point out violations and defects
  • Download report in PDF or MS Word
Download for IOS Download for Android

Pre-Made Templates + Customized Reports and Forms

Use our pre-made industry proven templates to get you on the ground running. Or use our checklist editor to create your very own template. Impress your clients with a beautifully branded, professional and comprehensive report. No other software on the market can provide the level of customizations that SnapInspect can.Customize any visual element, any colour theme to match your branding requirements, add disclaimers, summarize bad conditions, hide empty items and display photos inline with items or at the end of the report and much more. To get your report into SnapInspect get in touch with us:
reports@snapinspect.com

  • USA/Canada ASHI and NACHI standards
  • Australia all state specific reports (Government Format - NSW/QLD/VIC etc)
  • New Zealand Pre-Purchase Condition Reports, Meth and Asbestos Testing
  • Standard Home Inspection, 4 Point, TREC, Wind Mitigation, Muld, Environmental, Thermal & Heating, Home Energy Score
  • United Kingdom Home Condition Reports
  • Home Buyers/Sellers, Section8 Inspection, Four Point, Plumbing and Structural Reports
  • Any home inspection related forms and much more
Check Out The Web App

Web Management Portal

  • Manage your team's inspections progress and performance
  • Download PDF/WORD and Quick Edit for post inspection work
  • Customizable email templates for quick sending of reports
  • Convert reports from Move out to Move in & vice versa
  • Schedule inspections, Track & Follow up Actions/Word Orders
  • Share a web version of the report, Quick send reports and acquire signatures remotely
